識我嘅人都知道我係一個曼狗，但係其實我自從睇完2014年嘅FA cup final 之後，我亦都成為左一個阿狗。嗰陣時阿仙奴落後緊Hull二比零，形勢非常之差，就係呢個時候Carzola 20幾碼罰球掛網頂一嘢收死門將，自此之後逆轉左個形勢。自從嗰日之後我就超鍾意卡蘇拿，有佢嘅比賽比賽我都會追。盤扭，傳波，射波，視野，控制比賽節奏佢樣樣都掂，簡直係自從沙維同埋恩尼斯達之後最勁嘅中場大師。如果阿仙奴嘅比賽有佢入波或者助攻嘅話，我第二日一定會去YouTubeJ番幾次。但係好景不常，班垃圾阿仙奴軍醫搞到卡叔連波都差啲睇唔到。我依家見到佢喺維拉利爾搵到第二春，其實我都係幾開心嘅。自從卡叔係阿仙奴踢唔到之後，我就少咗留意阿仙奴，直到奧巴美揚喺2018年轉會去到阿仙奴之後，我就開始多咗留意阿仙奴。起初佢係阿仙奴俾人感覺都係高薪低能feel，除咗速度同埋射術夠班之外，佢其他方面都係唔合格嘅，尤其係體格，俾人撞一撞之後已經甩咗個波。直到今年佢好似變左第二個人咁樣，除咗射術keep住以前咁勁之外，佢嘅盤扭丶傳波都升左個層次, 佢今年嘅入波已經多到我J唔晒，而且今年阿仙奴可以攞到FA cup冠軍絕對係靠佢Carry。 我覺得佢而家已經可以問鼎全英超最佳嘅前鋒，甚至係全世界。我覺得如果阿仙奴真係成功同到奧巴美揚續約嘅話，攞英超冠軍只係遲早嘅事。

OGC Nice join Napoli in showing interest in Sokratis

Sokratis Papastathopoulos could still leave Arsenal before Monday, with Nice joining Napoli in showing an interest in the centre-back.

For a while now, we’ve heard about interest from Napoli in Sokratis Papastathopoulos and their indecisiveness in pushing the deal through, but it looks like Nice might now join the race for the centre-back.

Ciro Venerato claims Nice also placed an enquiry for Sokratis. He adds that Napoli have a deal for the defender in place, but it depends on outgoings – notably Kalidou Koulibaly.

Koulibaly’s departure is looking significantly less likely at the moment. The main club in for him was always Manchester City, and they’ve just signed Ruben Dias at the back.

There could be another way to push Napoli into buying, however. Fabrizio Romano reports that West Ham are in talks with Napoli for Nikola Maksimovic. There’s no agreement yet, but that move would provide the Serie A side with funds and motivation to sign Sokratis.

Otherwise, it looks like Nice are an alternative option for the Greek international. He really needs to leave Arsenal this summer, with Mikel Arteta clearly not planning to use him regularly.

Arteta has so many alternatives when everyone is fit, so it’ll be a year on the bench – or not even in the squad – for the 32-year-old if he stays. As for Arsenal, they need to free up non-homegrown spots and raise funds for new signings.

Sokratis has returned to full training ahead of Arsenal’s game against Liverpool on Thursday night but it looks like the defender will be on his way from the club before the window shuts.

Ahead of Arsenal’s return to Liverpool for the second game at Anfield in a week, Sokratis has now made a return to full fitness and is in contention to play.
Sokratis has been out for a number of weeks with a calf strain that was only supposed to rule him out for a few days. It was, you have to admit, starting to look like a serious case of transferitis.

Napoli, Arsenal and Sokratis all have an agreement for the player to move there but only if Manchester City sign Kalidou Koulibaly. It was not clear if City were playing with Napoli, hoping to drive down their asking price, but it seems they might have splashed their cash elsewhere:

That doesn’t mean Sokratis will be sticking around as Nice are also interested in bringing him to France.

With William Saliba, Gabriel, David Luiz, Calum Chambers, Rob Holding, and Shkodran Mustafi all still at the club in addition to the Greek defender, it is clear Arsenal need to ship out some centrebacks.

Mustafi could also leave before the window shuts next week. Lazio are reportedly negotiating his transfer with Mustafi’s father, and agent, Kujtim, reaching an agreement on salary.
